## TaskObject type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TaskObject = {
    id: string;
    model: 'task';
    index: number;
    listIds: Array<string>;
    name: string;
    description: string;
    status: string;
    assigneesIds: Array<string>;
    fields: Array<{
        fieldTemplateId: string;
        value?: string;
        date?: string;
        labels?: Array<string>;
        linkedTasks?: Array<{
            id?: string;
            index?: number;
        }>;
    }>;
    deleted: boolean;
    deletedAt: string;
    deletedByUserId: string;
    completed: boolean;
    completedAt: string;
    createdAt: string;
    createdUserId: string;
    lastActivityAt: string;
    url: string;
    trashedAt: string;
    trashedByUserId: string;
    parentTaskId?: string;
};
```
